scripts.quickstart: npm install && npm run aws:deploy && npm run react:generate:config && npm run react:build && npm run react:deploy
scripts.aws:deploy: cd ./aws-app && npm install && (cdk bootstrap && cdk deploy --outputs-file ./cdk-outputs.json && cd ..) || cd ..
scripts.react:build: cd ./react-app && npm install && (npm run build && cd ..) || cd ..
